topics.body:
So I've made a odd decision, and now I'm trying to marathon the old Thomas and Friends TV show.
!http://i.ytimg.com/vi/L25P2pwJ0UQ/hqdefault.jpg!
*Yes, I'm actually doing this. No joke, no irony, no sarcasm.
Just happy, blissful childhood nostalgia.*

_But right now, I'm actually marathoning the original UK version of the show with Ringo Starr._

Truth be told, I'm much more familiar with George Carlin and Alec Baldwin's work on the show, growing up on the US dub on VHS, but Ringo Starr actually does hold up quite well as a narrator.
topics.author: 536f7a11636872666e2d0000

topics.body:
"@ToskiHero":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/554d29616368721ffd050800#post_554d29616368721ffd050800
I still can't get over that George "shit, piss, fuck, cunt, cocksucker, motherfucker, and tits" carlin narrated a kids show

I think this Sonic Adventure playthrough that Liam Woolie and Matt are doing is my fucking favorite.

The only thing I wish though is that they didn't have to skip pieces so much.
